SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.client.view
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class PersonalGoal

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.PersonalGoal
public class PersonalGoal extends Object
This class represents a personal goal card, which contains the disposition of the items to be matched by the player in the bookshelf in order to increase its score.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • PersonalGoal

      public PersonalGoal(List<Coordinates> loadedCoordinates, List<Color> loadedColors, int index)
      Creates a personal goal card. It is a representation of the spaces that a player has to fill with his bookshelf's items, to increase his final score.
      Parameters:
      loadedCoordinates - the coordinates of the spaces to fill, read from a file
      loadedColors - the colors of the spaces to fill, read from a file

      Parameters:
      key - the coordinates of the space to check
      Returns:
      the color of the item to be matched

    • getPoints

      public int getPoints(Bookshelf bookshelf)

      Returns:
